info.name: Rizzoli & Isles Season 2 Updated
info.description: A Rizzoli & Isles Season 2 dash theme (Version 2): Updated to work with the new dash icons.
info.additionalInfo:
A Rizzoli & Isles Season 2 dash theme 
Coding from http://userstyles.org/styles/63727/tumblr-dashboard-theme-nebula-exarock

Icons from http://www.iconarchive.com/show/body-care-icons-by-rade8.html, http://interfacelift.com/icons/details/1977/the_bourne_ultimatum.html, http://mgilchuk.deviantart.com/art/Shoot-Em-Up-Icons-Wallpaper-80741423, http://mgilchuk.deviantart.com/art/Nicely-Stuffed-77556268, http://www.iconarchive.com/show/griots-icons-by-archigraphs.html, http://www.iconarchive.com/show/super-vista-medical-icons-by-iconshock.html & http://www.iconarchive.com/show/vista-love-icons-by-icons-land.html 

Textures from http://www.wearepixel8.com/blog/6-free-seamless-paper-textures/ & http://lostandtaken.com/blog/2011/6/2/6-high-quality-seamless-paper-textures.html
